comment: Smart Data Models - LoadStatic adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/LoadStatic/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. General static load model representing the sensitivity of the real and reactive power consumed by the load to the amplitude and frequency of the bus voltage.

contents.name: LoadAggregate
contents.comment: Aggregate load to which this aggregate static load belongs. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ep1
contents.comment: First term voltage exponent for active power (Ep1).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ep2
contents.comment: Second term voltage exponent for active power (Ep2).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ep3
contents.comment: Third term voltage exponent for active power (Ep3).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: eq1
contents.comment: First term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq1).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: eq2
contents.comment: Second term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq2).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: eq3
contents.comment: Third term voltage exponent for reactive power (Eq3).  Used only when .staticLoadModelType = exponential. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp1
contents.comment: First term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp1).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp2
contents.comment: Second term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp2).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp3
contents.comment: Third term voltage coefficient for active power (Kp3).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp4
contents.comment: Frequency coefficient for active power (Kp4).  Must be non-zero when .staticLoadModelType = ZIP2.  Not used for all other values of .staticLoadModelType. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpf
contents.comment: Frequency deviation coefficient for active power (Kpf).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kq1
contents.comment: First term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq1).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kq2
contents.comment: Second term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq2).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kq3
contents.comment: Third term voltage coefficient for reactive power (Kq3).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kq4
contents.comment: Frequency coefficient for reactive power (Kq4).  Must be non-zero when .staticLoadModelType = ZIP2.  Not used for all other values of .staticLoadModelType. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kqf
contents.comment: Frequency deviation coefficient for reactive power (Kqf).  Not used when .staticLoadModelType = constantZ. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: staticLoadModelType
contents.comment: Type of static load model.  Typical Value = constantZ. Default: None

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
